title: 2,000IP Chroma question
body: If I were to buy 3 of the 6 Shockblade Zed chromas with IP and then bought the bundle for the last 3 would the bundle still cost the full amount of RP? Or would I get roughly half off for already owning three of the chromas? Just curious, because I'll have enough IP to buy 3 of them as well as RP to buy the bundle, but if I get a discount for owning some of them then I may as well blow my IP on as many as I can and buy the rest with RP.

replies.body: Bundles should always taken into account what you already own.

Not all bundles are *Flexible bundles*, however, Chroma Pack bundles are. If you own content inside the bundle, your price with RP should be discounted from the full price. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
